docs.title: Managing Menstrual Cramps — Heat & NSAIDs
docs.text: Applying heat to the lower abdomen and taking NSAIDs such as ibuprofen can reduce menstrual cramp pain. Consider starting NSAIDs at the onset of menses. Not medical advice.

docs.title: Lifestyle Tips During Luteal Phase
docs.text: During the luteal phase, some people experience mood changes, bloating, and fatigue. Prioritizing sleep, balanced nutrition, and moderate exercise may help. Not medical advice.
